loginButton.description: Label for the Yandex login button.

loginRequired.message: Authorization is required to upload files to Yandex Disk.
loginRequired.description: Text explaining why login is needed.

fileSelectionLabel.message: 1. Select a file to convert (GPX, KML, KMZ, CSV)

folderNameLabel.message: 2. Enter a name for the folder on Yandex Disk
folderNameLabel.description: Label for the folder name input.

folderNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the folder name input.

convertButton.description: Label for the convert and upload button.

statusAuthSuccess.message: You are authorized! Select a file.

statusProcessing.description: Status message when file processing starts.

statusCreatingFolder.description: Status message when creating a folder on Yandex Disk.

statusGettingUrl.description: Status message when getting the upload URL.

statusUploading.description: Status message when uploading the file.

statusSuccess.message: Success! The file has been uploaded to your Yandex Disk.

errorUnsupportedFile.description: Error message for unsupported file types.

errorNoKmlInKmz.message: KML file not found in KMZ archive.
errorNoKmlInKmz.description: Error message when a KMZ file does not contain a KML file.

errorCsvColumns.message: Could not find latitude/longitude columns in CSV.
errorCsvColumns.description: Error message when CSV parsing fails to find coordinate columns.

errorGetUploadUrl.description: Error message when failing to get an upload URL from Yandex Disk.

errorFileUpload.description: Error message when the final file upload fails.

alertMissingInput.message: Please select a file and enter a folder name.
alertMissingInput.description: Alert message when user clicks convert without selecting a file or entering a folder name.
